Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Dear ecomobile,

Thank you for your message, please keep us updated and issue a refund as soon as possible.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Have a nice day.

Best regards,
Astrid Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have cancelled the order and refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
